title: Learn With Mind Maps: How To Enhance Your Memory
description:
Michelle Mapman, "Learn With Mind Maps: How To Enhance Your Memory, Take Better Notes, Boost Your Creativity, And Gain An Edge In Work Or School ? Easily."
ISBN: 1617042110 | 2013 | 110 pages | EPUB

Mindmapping helps you learn in a way you've never seen before.

See, from a very early age, we have been taught WHAT we need to learn -- but never HOW to learn it.

And while we may have done OK with that, the truth is -- you can unlock your brain to do MUCH MORE than you probably think possible.

But to become a successful learner, you need some basic training.

And that's where this book comes in.
